info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 02 at 9:31PM MDT until July 03 at 2:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM MDT FOR EAST CENTRAL HARDING AND WEST CENTRAL PERKINS COUNTIES... At 930 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Sorum, or 35 miles southeast of Buffalo, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained Spotter reported IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sorum. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
